body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Taylor Automotive. My name is Joseph Taylor. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Madison White.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, nine one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. Can I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is madison.white@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Madison. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I just wanted to inquire about a return policy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'll be happy to help with that. Thank you for your time, Madison. Have a great day!
